title: Foundry Form Sans
content:
Hi Guys,

Hoping someone can save me a few hours researching and let me know a similar font to Foundry Form Sans? Clients tight, times ticking away and i am stuck. any help MUCH appreciated!!!!

Jim
author: jim adams

comments.content:
[ITC Tabula](http://web.archive.org/web/20140731181447/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=405670&grab_id=0&page_id=44375&query=Tabula&SCOPE=Fonts) is very similar except the M is splayed.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Jim,

have a look at this thread with lots of suggestions:  
 [Attack of the Square Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140731181447/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28458). [DTL Argo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140731181447/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Argo_rdrct.html) is especially nice.  
F

If his clients don't want to spend for Foundry Form Sans, it doesn't seem they would be likely to buy a DTL font, even though it's a beauty.

- Mike Yanega
